attributes.action: Stop the stupidity of forcing Heat Pumps on the public unnecessarily!
attributes.additional_details:
Accept that the Government's Zero-CO2 plan is unattainable, and stop it now!  The sun is the determinant of CO2 on Earth. The UK contributes a tiny fraction of the total amount of worldwide CO2 which is produced each day. COP28 didn't help, with 90,000 delegates flying in from all over the world!
Accept that the UK is NOT the big bad giant they are trying to sell to     the public, and fining boiler manufacturers for NOT selling heat pumps which will NOT do the job properly anyway.
attributes.background: Accept that the Government's Zero-CO2 plan is unattainable, and stop it now before it becomes another HS2!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653313
